list.title: Foundation#appendAfter
list.description: Inserts the player in the children list of the siblingElement's parent, just after the siblingElement.

list.title: Foundation#appendTo
list.description: Appends the media player to a specified HTML.

list.title: Foundation#currentTime
list.description: Return the current playback time in seconds.

list.title: Foundation#currentTimeFormatted
list.description: Retrieves the current playback time formatted as an ISO 8601 string ( hh:mm:ss ).

list.title: Foundation#currentTimePercentage
list.description: Retrieves the current playback time as a parcentage of the duration.

list.title: Foundation#duration
list.description: Return the length of the media in seconds.

list.title: Foundation#durationFormatted
list.description: Return the duration of the media as an ISO 8601 string ( hh:mm:ss ).

list.title: Foundation#getPercentage
list.description: Returns the playback's percentage corresponding to time.

list.title: Foundation#getTime
list.description: Returns the time in seconds corresponding to a given percentage of the duration.

list.title: Foundation#getTimeFormatted
list.description: Returns the time corresponding to a given percentage of the duration as an ISO 8601 formatted string ( hh:mm:ss ).

list.title: Foundation#isBuffering
list.description:
Indicates whether the player is currently buffering content.
isBuffering differs from isWaiting in that isWaiting is only true when reproduction has caught up with the buffer.
A player may be capable of buffering and reproducing content simultaneously.
Therefore, it is possible for isBuffering to be true while isWaiting is false.

list.title: Foundation#isEnded
list.description:
Indicates whether the media has finished playing.
It must be false when isReproducing is true.

list.title: Foundation#isPaused
list.description: Self-explanatory.

list.title: Foundation#isPlaying
list.description: Self-explanatory.

list.title: Foundation#isReproducing
list.description:
Indicates whether reproduction is currently in progress.
This property differs from isPlaying in that a player can be "playing" while waiting for the buffer to load, but it may not be actively "reproducing" content.
When isReproducing is true, isWaiting must be false.

list.title: Foundation#isWaiting
list.description:
Indicates whether the player is unable to reproduce due to lack of data.
When true, isReproducing must be false.

list.title: Foundation#play
list.description:
Starts/resume the reproduction of the media.
It accepts the same parameters as seek().

list.title: Foundation#player:ended
list.description: Fired when the reproduction has reached its end.

list.title: Foundation#player:error
list.description:
Fired when an error ocurred at any moment in the lifecycle.
It is detailed by two proprieties: errorCode and errorMessage

list.title: Foundation#player:pause
list.description: Fired when the player is paused.

list.title: Foundation#player:play
list.description: Fired when the player starts playing.

list.title: Foundation#player:playing
list.description: Fired when the reproduction is ready to start after having been previously paused due to lack of data.

list.title: Foundation#player:timeupdate
list.description: Continualy fired as the reproduction progresses.

list.title: Foundation#player:waiting
list.description: Fired when when reproduction has stopped because of a temporary lack of data.

list.title: Foundation#prependTo
list.description: Inserts the player before the first child of the parentElement.

list.title: Foundation#remainingTime
list.description: Return the remaining time in seconds.

list.title: Foundation#remainingTimeFormatted
list.description: Return the remaining time as an ISO 8601 string ( hh:mm:ss ).

list.title: Foundation#remainingTimePercentage
list.description: Return the remaining time as a percentage of the duration.

list.title: Foundation#seek
list.description: Seeks the media to the new position.

list.title: Foundation#toggle
list.description: Resumes playing, or pauses, it depends on the current state.

list.title: Foundation#volume
list.description: Returns the volume, an integer between 0 and 100.

list.title: Helpers.loadExternalJs
list.description: A helpful method to load external scripts.
